resources.string: You are driving on a remote road and suddenly notice smoke coming from your engine. Suddenly another car arrives and driver offers help.
I could take lift to the next town.
Driver looks little bit shady and stinks of old whiskey.
As you begin to drive, the driver starts talking some stuff.
I could do some small talking.
You decided not to enter the car and called help instead.
Driver drops you to next town.
You talk with the driver and find out that he knows good car repair store.
